title: Ben
description: Talk show with host Gentle Ben who speaks with regular folks, like mothers and daughters, and takes questions from the audience.
altHero: Gentle Ben, a brown bear with a microphone attached to its head peeks out from behind a curtain
alt1: six women sitting in chairs on a talk show stage
alt2: Ben, wearing his microphone helmet, looks at a studio audience
alt3: Ben holds his head low so a woman in the audience can speak into it
alt4: people in “Ben Control” vests shoot darts at Ben while he eats a fish at a crafts table
